name: Sohar Health
headline: AI-powered insurance verification to boost patient conversion.
description:
Sohar Health is an AI-driven front-end RCM solution that transforms insurance verification processes for healthcare providers, enabling faster patient conversions and reducing administrative workloads.  With a 95% automation rate, our API-first platform seamlessly integrates into existing workflows to provide real-time claim accuracy and eligibility checks. 
Key performance metrics showcase the power of our technology: Median latency of just 6 seconds, ensuring real-time eligibility; over 90% of checks returned within 30 seconds for increased patient conversion; 96% accuracy in identifying and verifying benefits details; Industry-leading 99% accuracy for eligibility determination; >90% carve-out detection rate, mitigating surprise billing risks; a 60% success rate with our Insurance Discovery API, helping identify coverage for self-pay patients.

Our customers include outpatient clinics, specialty practices, and digital health platforms looking to streamline front-end claim management. By reducing errors and maximizing clean claim submissions, Sohar Health empowers healthcare organizations to convert and retain more patients, reduce operating costs, and increase their top-line revenue.
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:health-tech; industry:digital-health; industry:api; industry:data-science; location:new-york

founders.name: Dr Ashish Mandavia MD, Founder
founders.description: I am a health-tech entrepreneur, with a clinical background, and the CEO at Sohar Health, automating insurance eligibility verifications. With 8+ years of combined experience in health-related startups, strategy consulting, and clinical practice, I have a unique perspective and skill set to drive innovation and growth in the digital health and technology space across EMEA and the US.

founders.name: Lucas Gordon, Founder
founders.description: CTO and cofounder of Sohar Health (S23). I have 14+ years experience as a software engineering, most recently as CTO and first employee at Pelago (W18) where I led a team of 40 across software engineering, data engineering and information security. During my time at Pelago I helped take the company from pre-seed to post series B, raising over $80M and positioning the company as the world's leading virtual clinic for substance use management.

## Improve your patient intake processes with Sohar.
[96%Accurate](https://www.soharhealth.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)[12%Increased Conversion](https://www.soharhealth.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)[4M+Verified](https://www.soharhealth.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)
**Accuracy with speed.** Verifying patient insurance eligibility and other top-of-funnel information has never been faster or more accurate. Over 90% of our verifications are surfaced within 30 seconds, with a median latency of 6 seconds.
**Real Outcomes.** Sohar reduces claims denials and cuts operational costs, driving real business outcomes. Our providers see an increase in revenue and a 12% boost in patient conversion.
**Verification at scale.** We conduct more than 4 million eligibility verification checks annually for healthcare providers, driving more than 8x ROI for clients within twelve months.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67606bb4a660757b3bc4b55f/677c486e8dcf359dd0fb267a_Verification.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67606bb4a660757b3bc4b55f/67885a41e255e4a43cd825cd_AdobeStock_581796037%20Large.avif)
## Patient Intake
Streamline your onboarding.
Figure out who’s covered as early as possible, preventing unnecessary drop-offs that hurt your bottom line.
  * Discovery of patient’s active insurance based on name, DoB and state
  * Verification via real-time eligibility checks
  * Network status clarified, including in and out-of-network services


[Read more](https://www.soharhealth.com/</use/patient-intake>)
## Real-time Eligibility
Let our API handle it.
Take the hassle out of eligibility and verification of benefits by eliminating manual workflow in favor of automation.
  * Eligibility and VoB conducted instantly
  * Payer coverage identified across national and regional payers
  * High reliability and speed—under 30 seconds without any human intervention


[Read more](https://www.soharhealth.com/</use/real-time-eligibility>)[Documentation](https://www.soharhealth.com/<https:/docs.soharhealth.com/api-reference/api/introduction>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67606bb4a660757b3bc4b55f/677c486e86e724409a624a2c_Discovery.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67606bb4a660757b3bc4b55f/677c486eb27affb73e47299e_Insights.svg)
Denial Rate
## Reduction in Claim Denials
Fewer no’s mean more revenue.
Prevent the unnecessary claims denials that plague front-end RCM and reap the financial benefits.
  * Payer intelligence routes requests by verifying and correcting member details in real time
  * Benefit-related entity and carve-out identification to prevent incorrect submissions
  * Network status determination that satisfies patients and increases the chance of a successful claim


[Read more](https://www.soharhealth.com/</use/reduction-in-claims-denials>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67606bb4a660757b3bc4b55f/676108760925709190a427a6_orangestamp.avif)
## Transform your patient intake process today.
Book time to connect with the Sohar team.
[Book a demo](https://www.soharhealth.com/<#booknow-popup>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67606bb4a660757b3bc4b55f/67610fafe9014b5afbcefadf_testimonialslogo01.avif)
“Automating eligibility through Sohar has addressed a business-critical area for Talkiatry. By reducing manual workflows and improving the accuracy of our insurance verifications, we've enhanced patient conversion rates, improved operational efficiency, and reduced our claim denial rate—all while achieving an 8:1 ROI in the first 12 months. From my perspective, continuing this partnership is essential to tackling new challenges and driving even greater impact in our RCM processes.”
Robert Krayn
CEO
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67606bb4a660757b3bc4b55f/676111b0be9aa0e6d8bdcae5_greenservice.avif)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67606bb4a660757b3bc4b55f/678815c0c59867bd9e1ab97c_robertcrayn.avif)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67606bb4a660757b3bc4b55f/67610faf4eff15182cf60bae_testimonialslogo03.avif)
“When patient eligibility and verification companies use the word ‘accuracy,’ make sure you understand how they’re defining it. Obtaining a ‘valid response’ from a provider isn’t the same thing as an accurate response. And it matters, because when eligibility goes wrong in the mental health space, there’s a real chance you’re causing instability in an already vulnerable person’s life.”
Jack Sykstus
Senior Product Manager
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67606bb4a660757b3bc4b55f/676111b0be9aa0e6d8bdcae5_greenservice.avif)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67606bb4a660757b3bc4b55f/676110a581a8cebc1b0e1e15_testimonialsheadshot02.avif)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67606bb4a660757b3bc4b55f/67610fafe9014b5afbcefadf_testimonialslogo01.avif)
“I’ve been really impressed with the Sohar team. Easy to work with. Deep understanding of the space. And most importantly, the results speak for themselves. Fast, accurate responses mean we’ve been able to meaningfully improve our patient experience and get significantly more qualified patients through our intake funnel.”
Matt Ivester
SVP, Head of Product
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67606bb4a660757b3bc4b55f/676111b0be9aa0e6d8bdcae5_greenservice.avif)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67606bb4a660757b3bc4b55f/678816215fc61cf7b7a1a542_1597880559.avif)

## Improve your patient intake processes with Sohar.
96%Accurate⟨20⟩12%Increased Conversion⟨21⟩4M+Verified⟨22⟩
**Accuracy with speed.** Verifying patient insurance eligibility and other top-of-funnel information has never been faster or more accurate. Over 90% of our verifications are surfaced within 30 seconds, with a median latency of 6 seconds.
**Real Outcomes.** Sohar reduces claims denials and cuts operational costs, driving real business outcomes. Our providers see an increase in revenue and a 12% boost in patient conversion.
**Verification at scale.** We conduct more than 4 million eligibility verification checks annually for healthcare providers, driving more than 8x ROI for clients within twelve months.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67606bb4a660757b3bc4b55f/677c486e8dcf359dd0fb267a_Verification.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67606bb4a660757b3bc4b55f/67885a41e255e4a43cd825cd_AdobeStock_581796037%20Large.avif)
## Patient Intake
Streamline your onboarding.
Figure out who’s covered as early as possible, preventing unnecessary drop-offs that hurt your bottom line.
  * Discovery of patient’s active insurance based on name, DoB and state
  * Verification via real-time eligibility checks
  * Network status clarified, including in and out-of-network services


Read more⟨7⟩
## Real-time Eligibility
Let our API handle it.
Take the hassle out of eligibility and verification of benefits by eliminating manual workflow in favor of automation.
  * Eligibility and VoB conducted instantly
  * Payer coverage identified across national and regional payers
  * High reliability and speed—under 30 seconds without any human intervention


Read more⟨8⟩Documentation⟨23⟩
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67606bb4a660757b3bc4b55f/677c486e86e724409a624a2c_Discovery.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67606bb4a660757b3bc4b55f/677c486eb27affb73e47299e_Insights.svg)
Denial Rate
## Reduction in Claim Denials
Fewer no’s mean more revenue.
Prevent the unnecessary claims denials that plague front-end RCM and reap the financial benefits.
  * Payer intelligence routes requests by verifying and correcting member details in real time
  * Benefit-related entity and carve-out identification to prevent incorrect submissions
  * Network status determination that satisfies patients and increases the chance of a successful claim


Read more⟨9⟩
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67606bb4a660757b3bc4b55f/676108760925709190a427a6_orangestamp.avif)

generated_description:
Sohar Health is an exciting startup that's paving the way for smarter insurance verification in healthcare. Founded in 2023 and part of Y Combinator's Batch S23, Sohar Health has a mission to leverage AI for insurance verification, which ultimately boosts patient conversion rates.

What sets Sohar Health apart is its AI-driven front-end Revenue Cycle Management (RCM) solution. By optimizing the insurance verification process, it enables healthcare providers to reduce administrative burdens and accelerate patient onboarding. With an impressive 95% automation rate, their API-first platform integrates seamlessly with existing workflows, allowing real-time claim accuracy and eligibility checks.

The performance metrics are compelling: real-time eligibility checks average a mere 6 seconds of latency, and over 90% of these checks are completed within 30 seconds. Accuracy is also a strong suit, boasting a 99% eligibility determination accuracy and 96% accuracy in identifying benefits details. On top of that, they achieve over a 90% carve-out detection rate, significantly lowering the chances of surprise billing.

Sohar Health serves a diverse clientele, including outpatient clinics, specialty practices, and digital health platforms that are keen to enhance their claims management processes. By improving accuracy and reducing errors, they empower healthcare organizations to attract and retain more patients, cut operational costs, and boost revenue. The team, which is located in New York and consists of eight members, is led by Group Partner Gustaf Alstromer.

Their product offerings are straightforward and effective:
- **Verification**: Quickly confirms patient benefits and streamlines intake workflows.
- **Discovery**: Helps identify patient coverage without prior insurance details.
- **Network Status** and **Cost Estimate**: Both features are "coming soon" to enhance transparency and financial clarity for patients.

Sohar Health isn't just about technology; it's about real-world impact. Their solutions have reportedly driven an 8:1 return on investment for clients within the first twelve months. Anecdotes from users emphasize improved patient experiences, better operational efficiency, and significantly reduced claim denial rates.

For those interested in automating their insurance verification processes, Sohar Health is definitely a company to watch. You can find out more about their innovative solutions on their website [Sohar Health](https://www.soharhealth.com).
